sections.pali: ‘‘Cando yathā vigatavalāhake nabhe, obhāsayaṃ gacchati antalikkhe; Tathūpamaṃ tuyhamidaṃ vimānaṃ, obhāsayaṃ tiṭṭhati antalikkhe.
‘‘Deviddhipattosi mahānubhāvā, manussabhūto kimakāsi puññaṃ; Kenāsi evaṃ jalitānubhāvo, vaṇṇo ca te sabbadisā pabhāsatī’’ti.
So devaputto attamano…pe… yassa kammassidaṃ phalaṃ.
‘‘Ahañca bhariyā ca manussaloke, upassayaṃ arahato adamha; Annañca pānañca pasannacittā, sakkacca dānaṃ vipulaṃ adamha.
‘‘Tena metādiso vaṇṇo…pe… vaṇṇo ca me sabbadisā pabhāsatī’’ti. Paṭhamaupassayadāyakavimānaṃ catutthaṃ.
